content:
The Snow Fox Questline in Chapter 3 will see you track down a monk who has wronged a fox guai. Transform into a fox and confront the monk at New Thunderclap Temple to face Non-Void. 

Non-Void
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", within the section "Secret Bosses in Chapter 3" and the sub-section "Non-Void". The content is presented below:

The Snow Fox Questline in Chapter 3 will see you track down a monk who has wronged a fox guai. Transform into a fox and confront the monk at New Thunderclap Temple to face Non-Void. 

Non-Void
